ProductInfo.Features:
720p (1440 x 900) resolution; NTSC/ATSC tuners; Widescreen (16:10) aspect; 850:1 contrast ratio; HDMI input; PC connectivity
Accepts HD signals: This television has a built-in ATSC tuner to display HD programming and accepts 480i/480p/720p/1080i signals.
Audio: The built-in speakers feature SAP capability.
Mounting: Element's 19" LCD is compatible with 100 x 100 VESA standard mounting systems, so you can hang it on the wall like a work of art.
Other features: Trilingual on-screen display (English, French, Spanish), sleep timer, closed captioning, detachable stand and a full-function remote control.
ProductInfo.Name: Element 19" Widescreen LCD HDTV w/ HDMI input and PC Connectivity
